title: Great product, Terrible app
text:
SimpleHuman:  That such well-designed products would be associated with such a frustrating app is mildly funny and mostly disappointing. Lots of glitches, occasional crashes, regular hang-ups — and I have yet to make one successful order from the app.  

As an app that’s meant to take a small task and make it both reliable and effortless, it does neither. I’ve purchased multiple SimpleHuman products over the years and have never regretted a single one. Unless I count this app as a purchase, because I give up. I installed this app when it first came out and have tried it out after multiple updates. It never seems to get better. But my patience is gone. So the app is now deleted from my phone. I’ll stick to ordering online the old-fashioned way!

title: Version 2.0 forced mirror users to a different app with reduced features.
text: My mirror was working perfectly with this app. I opened it today and it has apparently been redesigned and I was directed to use a different app instead. The new app is missing two important features of the old one. I cannot see the charge level of my mirror now, and I also cannot adjust the settings so that the light turns off automatically for any length of time past 30 seconds. The previous app allowed me to choose 1 minute, 5 minutes, and 10 minutes, on top of the options the new app has. I’ve enjoyed having this mirror but unless those features are added to the new app, I will not purchase from this company again.

title: App update
text: Updated to the new app and it deleted the three different trash cans I had listed.  It was much easier to find what bag size I needed by just opening the app instead of having to go and look on the trash cans.  It also deleted the bag sizes I had other then the one I have paused on auto-ship and the only way to add it back is to purchase it…but I don’t need new ones yet.  Make it easier to access this info and the app will be much better.

title: What happened??
text:
I’ve used this a few years, and now, it just times out. Could it be you’ve not made an update in 2 yrs?? You can’t sell trash cans, if this isn’t working for your best long time customers.
Updated app - now can’t log in app or web. No password reset response.  You’re killing your business!!

title: Service is brilliant at Simplehuman
text:
I had a problem with the mirror and app not linking. I wrote to customer care and they responded with a fix. 
The wide view pro mirror is quite expensive but is very well made, compare it to high priced sports car. 
One thing that irritates me is the side mirrors that don’t help in any way to view the side of your face or head. I would look only in the middle main mirror so not sure the purpose of the sides being there. Maybe the next go around they’ll make the sides more flexible!
However, I put my mirror on a tall cabinet in my bathroom with the magnifier. I’m 5’10” so I stand looking at the mirror. Only had it a short while and can’t give a super review but I’m glad I purchased this app to manage the mirror.

title: Very Cool Mirror
text: I just got this mirror the other day & am still learning how to use it, but so far I’m impressed. Not sure how I feel about using an app to turn lights up & down, etc., but I’ll keep an open mind over the next 2-3 wks. I love the size, the style, & not having a cord to hide/manage. I do wish the magnifying disk/mirror could be in a higher location so I didn’t have to hunch over to tweeze (like off to the right on upper part of mirror). I gave this 5 stars out of box after 1 use - maybe a tad premature... but so far I’m liking much more than my last Zadro round flip around mirror w/knob for power/light. Hopefully this new technology will be easy to get use to & the quality of lighting, etc will be worth the extra $$!

title: Simply lasts a looong time
text: I just bought the 30L butterfly step can to baffle the dogs. So far so good!  I have owned and used heavily, the semi round step can since 1999. Over 16 years old and still works fine! It has moved cross country with me from Alaska to Florida. However a border collie and german shepherd have been using their noses (and sometimes the peddle) to open it so decided to try the butterfly step can. The nicely sealing lid is a hit.  It doesn't allow odor to escape and has nothing external the girls can get a nose under to lift.  The way I have it sitting, pedal access isn't easy and even if they do get it open, they can't get in it. Score again for simple human!  This will probably outlive me and vex future generations of pooches and cats no doubt!!

title: Less accommodation to small households
text: The app is great. The product quantity and frequency of replenishment (minimum of 120 bags for trash; maximum of ten months as an interval for “automatic” shipment) are still far too “generous” in favor of the supplier for our household of two. More flexibility is in order, beyond leaving it to the consumer to delay a scheduled re-order. Very poor management choices and less than superior mindfulness of the range of needs.

title: Happy Human
text: A few months ago my friend told me using SimpleHuman products changed his life. Not because the products themselves were drastically different from other trash cans or soap dispensers, but because this company came up with a user-friendly app that changes the way you shop, order and set delivery dates for any of their refills. I downloaded the app and I agree, it's the future of shopping. The design is both beautiful and sleek and it's the kind of app that I see one day taking on many more capabilities. I'm excited that they've added Apple Pay and PayPal to stay ahead of the tech curve. So far I'm a happy human using SimpleHuman!

title: i love my mirror, but...
text:
i have the sensor pro i think 10" standing mirror with the lil magnifier, and i love it. i do not however love the fact that it needs to connect to bluetooth however often to update-- i didn't know when i first got it that it even could update; it's a mirror! i don't play with most settings, and i also don't usually have bluetooth enabled on my phone, but i've been trying to remember to do so now that i have this, and I will give it that it connects itself now, without me having to do it manually.

i had issues with the first one they sent me, but they replaced it and i haven't had issues since-- hope that continues! :)

title: Call me crazy
text: But I'm in love with this trash can!! Even with out the puppet!! Quality is all I can say, You get what you pay for has been a long time saying in our house for as long as I can remember. Simple Human epitomizes that Ideology. The fact that I'm ordering trashcan liners online says it all and I have no problem because not one bag is leaking broke and they all are just simply human if you can't afford it go to the clearance section at bed bath and beyond and wait to find a trashcan that's on sale there and then you'll see what I'm talking about. Definitely five stars all the way around definitely tools for efficient living.

title: Liners - really!
text: For the past year, I've been trying out different types of subscription services from shaving blades to gift boxes. I have to say that the biggest downfall is usually the quality of the product or the frequency....always too much or constantly running out. I've pretty much stopped all my services. So quite surprisingly simplehuman is working out the best so far. The trashbags are a perfect fit and really high quality. But most important, since I use a consistent amount of bags every week I can always buy the right amount and have it delivered to me at just the right time. Great app!

title: Get ready to be Robbed blind!!
text:
I’m providing this review to hopefully help others out there debating between visiting Lowe’s every couple weeks to purchase these ‘exclusive simple human garbage can liners’, and using the app for what seemingly is a much easier process to have them delivered to your front door when needed...or so I thought. 

So when you sign up you select your frequency and quantity. Pretty simple. But the actual app layout is somewhat confusing and difficult to use. Although my first couple deliveries were fine and the product was delivered as requested. But when COVID hit I needed to stop my deliveries. That’s when it got tough. 

The app is so extremely deceptive it’s next to impossible to find ‘where’ to cancel your subscription. After emailing them to request help and receiving an automated response saying give us 3 days to get back to you, I finally figured it out on my own. 

If you need to cancel at anytime, you can. Just click the product- getting to it is harder than you’d think. 

I’m just your average guy and can usually figure these things out but this one was a doozy. Definitely won’t be using it anymore.

title: Liliana
text: I love this app. Very user-friendly. While I was at the office today I noticed I was running low on bags for one of our trash cans. So I went on the app, clicked on the picture of the trash can and pressed Buy. My info had been previously saved so whenever I need to replenish I just go to the trash can pic and click Buy. That's it. All in less than 2 minutes. The app also allows you to get automatic shipments every few months, you choose the timeframe. That's perfect! I signed up to get them every 6 months. Love it!

title: Easy & Convenient
text: Very easy and convenient app to use if you have Simple Human products in your home! I love the auto shipment feature for my liners and the reminders that get sent. Unlike some auto shipment orders from other companies you can pause, stop, move the order date up and you save money with the auto shipment feature too! It's super convenient and so easy to use. No more running out of liners for me and getting frustrated because the store doesn't have my size and kind in stock :)

title: Love my waste bin!
text: Though it may seem tiny, this waste bin holds a heap of flower clippings, junk mail, meat tray, dirt and dust from the floors, excess wet dog food, you name it! It expands to fit your needs, is extremely tough yet flexible, and the size is perfect so that we fill it up for a couple days and toss before the kitchen starts to smell - like it would if we had a large, standing trash bin. It’s discrete and even when you do open your cabinet, its sleek design and dark colour is an upgrade to other waste containers. Incredibly sturdy bags, and bin!

title: Improved
text:
I’m happy to see a couple of improvements that might increase the longevity of this useful device. First is a hole in the interior liner holder that lets the air out as you place the liner into the can. 

Next is a hydraulic action when the lid closes so it does not come down with a bang.

I hope this lasts longer than the 18 months the last two kitchen cans I have owned. The size is just right for our small kitchen that I hesitate to buy anything smaller or larger since this is the perfect size to fit our needs.

The hole in the back of the liner in the interior liner holder will help keep the plastic liner from bunching up at the top and therefore making the lid of the can catch creating more pressure on mechanism that opens a lid causing it to fail inside of two years.

I will be happy to buy a lifetime of liners if only the mechanism that opens the lid will hold out that long.

title: Just terrible
text:
First - the interface. I understand the folks wanted to be "cutting edge" simple, but as a result the experience is not intuitive. Some screens are broken after use, the buttons stick after you touch them, but swipe off. 

The worst part - I installed it to reorder my liners, and there is just no way I can find to do it. All I see are icons of a human, and a plus sign, clicking on the latter just goes through questionnaire of adding a product, which I do, only to return to that screen with no changes. I assume there is some sort of an error when adding the product, but there is no support/feedback/complain button, and clicking on support link in AppStore just leads to their app page.

title: Simplehuman App
text: This has been the worst app experience I’ve ever had. I registered my products on the site, I am logged into my account through the app and on the site, and neither shows my products. I tried to manually choose my products and one of the two is not available as a product on the app. Essentially if I want trash liners, I can order though the app. Foam hand wash soaps for the rechargeable pumps are not yet online....? Doesn’t make sense and the app has a terrible interface. I can’t even imagine what it will be like when the the new sensor trash can comes out and it connects to WiFi. Seriously makes me question the upgrade to the WiFi version vs just the voice/sensor can.

title: Registration and missing products
text: So I have the voice/motion 58l trash cans that use H & Q trash bags. Neither are on this app despite being on the market for 5 years. They have both bags but you have to select a different manual trash bag. No big deal, but I received a card stating I could register on the app. That’s not possible. There are no Z bags on the app, but I guess that makes sense since the Z bags are new this year. Overall a waste of time. Will delete the app and just use the good old fashion web browser to register. Also, make sure you look at “recent reviews” and not overall as the algorithm gives these companies leeway. No way this is a 4.9/5 star app.

title: Excitement for a trash can!
text: Who ever said you can have such joy, with a trash can? Not only do they look fabulous, they are very functional and efficient, to boot! It’s a pleasure to replace the bags, with the compartment attached! Quick set up and you’re all set! Well worth the money spent! Love love love! Soon to purchase soap dispensers and refill soaps. I have ordered the compact dish rack, awaiting for its arrival! Who knew, you could get so happy, with Simplehuman products! 😉

title: Mother
text: This app could not have done a better job of updating my information, as soon as I needed it adjusted!! What an incredible job, thank you so much simple human. We recently moved, and it was so simple to adjust my location information, so that the liners could be sent to our new place!:) It seems like this app has been created to make the liner ordering process as straight forward as possible. We appreciate it!!!

title: Mary B
text: Thank you SO MUCH for making it so simple to order for delivery. I use one of your “C” liners every day, for medical reasons. I had kept putting off ordering online because I have always easily bought them from a (un-named large chain) store near my home. But that large store has been “closed” for some weeks, I assume for covid19 economic reasons. THANK YOU, SIMPLEHUMAN for helping me maintain ONE very important supply. Every ONE counts.

title: Slim can
text: Had a small spot for a trash can and I have been looking for one that would fit, yet hold a large amount of garbage .  This can is perfect. Not to big, slim enough to be out of sight and the price was really great compared to other cams I have researched and having bags automatically delivered is a real plus.  Don’t have to go to store and worry about a bag that will not fit.  Thanks!!!!

title: Fabulous! Super easy to use!
text: When I registered, it practically filled in every field for me! I don't have to remember to buy trash bags and I won't run out with their auto-renewal program! I love my new trash can!! I even bought my mom one...she said it's the best one she's ever had! I was concerned that every time my Doberman walked by it that it would automatically open...but it doesn't!! Oh...it's super quiet too!!! You've got to get one or two! ;)

title: Terrible for product registration

It doesn’t recognize that I already have some products registered, and doesn’t even include all simplehuman products to register if you’re starting from scratch. I own a lot of simplehuman products since I think they’re great, but account management leaves a lot to be desired. Even their website does a pretty poor job which is surprising and disappointing.

title: Great Products, BAD App
text:
Interface is horrible. I like that they are going for a minimalist look but it’s not functional or user friendly. 
You can’t easily figure out what buttons mean or how to do anything. When you do select something only a blank screen pops up. 
Also, all products actually available online are listed. For instance, 10 oz Foam Sensor Pump I just got, not listed. 
Also, you can’t update anything on your account through this app. If I have to go to the website to do anything then what is this app even for besides a waste of space on my phone!?

title: Online vs Store
text: I tried to buy local and failed. I purchased my dispensers at Bed Bath and Beyond and thought it would be simple to stop in and pick up more dish soap when needed. They do not keep it in stock. No one should wonder why stores are closing all over the country. When it is easier to use an app and order more products online stores are pins to go out of business.

title: Flawless execution
text:
I had not used the app in like two years. So I download the update. My password was long forgotten so I request a reset. Email arrived in seconds. Once in there is pics of the different trash cans.
It recognized that I had apple pay, so it gives me An option to use it, next to credit card and paypal.
It took me less than five minutes to do it all.

Well done folks.😀

title: It is really SIMPLE!!!
text: As for the product itself, I have used it for a couple of years and it is far and away the easiest garbage can to use. Hands down. Then there is there re order app. I’m a techie and have used many. Unlike most, they got the right too. It’s easy, intuitive and does not make me think. Well done! I love it.

title: Great waste can!
text: I am a designer and thus a pick about function, fit and looks. I was searching for the perfect size to fit between the toilet and the vanity and I already knew these are great quality because I own two others :) Love how the liner comes out for easy emptying and the perfectly sized liner bags make everything simple. (Ooo - they live up to their name ;) Plus they look fantastic!

title: Beautiful Subscription App
text: This is one of the best subscription apps I've used. It's simple, straightforward & user-friendly! The UI design is crisp & elegant, along with being easy to understand. It's very quick to find your product & determine what you need to order. Setting up the subscription is a concise process which allows you to feel confident about your future orders. Thanks SimpleHuman

title: Better than expected!  If we are talking about the product!
text: I just received my first dog food container made by simplehuman!  Fabulous!  I got your app to register my product but there is no place to register the dog food container!  No problem. . .I just ordered my second one anyway!  Hopefully, I will be able to register at some point!

title: Putt near perfect!
text: Once you go through the process for the first time, you realize what a cutting edge app this really is.  It takes a leap of faith the first time, because there are no "directions" other than a few icons.  But once I realized that all I needed to do was to follow what made sense.  The application is simple, and good.  Just what we always hope for, but rarely find.  This app delivers.

title: Trash receptacle
text: The trash can I ordered is not only large enough to handle several days worth of trash but it is very attractive! We ordered it to keep our one and a half old grandson out of the trash and it works beautifully.  The lid of the can  fits seamlessly into the top making it hard for little fingers to get into.   We love this garbage can!

title: Paused?
text: This has been a nightmare. We paused the deliveries because we still had some. I un-paused it and it showed upcoming shipment. Came back later when I was supposedly supposed to get the shipment and it said paused again. I did this 3 times and still I didn't have any. Still trying to get loners and I've had to go to the Container Store for more again. I understand the idea of a simple interface, but as others have pointed out, there is a problem with the pause and un-pause feature of this minimalist app.

title: Easy as it gets!
text: Simplehuman has it all figured out, hence saving me time on having to buy trash can liners that don't even fit my Simplehuman trash bin. After receiving several free liners with the purchase of my Simplehuman trash bin, I'm spoiled now, as no other liner fits perfectly as the Simplehuman liners. Yes there's an app for that! They refill our liners every four months with 130 liners for a fair price!

title: Use if you want a never ending supply of trash bags
text: This app is designed to sign you up for trash bag deliveries and then make it near impossible to cancel in the future. You can go online and remove your account details and credit card - but they still bill and send. If you change your address they still deliver to your old address. If you call they tell you that you need to watch a video on site to learn how to cancel via their app. This is deliberately designed to keep you stuck with their auto delivery service. Horrible horrible horrible.

title: Apple Pay Checkout Was Awesome!
text: Just used this app to order replacement trash bags for our new simplehuman trash can. Finding the right size bags was simple and quick and the Apple Pay checkout took care of the payment and shipping info with just one Touch ID confirmation. This app is a must have if you own any of their products.

title: I just need some garbage bags, I don’t need to join your community.
text: Hey! All I want to do is order new liners for my trashcan. I don’t want to “join a community,” I don’t want to give you all my personal information so you can track me, I don’t want to order recurring re-orders of my liners, I just want to order some more liners. Because you make this simple human task ridiculously difficult – no, pardon me, IMPOSSIBLE on your app, I have deleted it. What makes companies think they can make us jump through hoops for the opportunity to give them our money for a product?

title: Easy once you find it
text: I had to keep adding the same trash can to order the liners. Not sure why my already registered can doesn't show up in my profile. Once I added it again, it worked very easily. I wish the registered can would show up somewhere tho. Now that I have an order history I think it will be less of an issue.

title: Crazy easy, only bulk options
text: This process is so simple and easy to use, which is why I was drawn to it. However, we have a small household and try to minimize waste, so we only use 1-2 bags per week. That means 120 bags (the smallest unit I could buy the M size in) is more than a year’s supply, but the longest period possible is 10 mo. A smaller option for small homes would be nice.

title: Limited app
text: I’m getting too many bags, and I tried to cancel my order using the app and there is not an intuitive way that works. The drop-down arrow’s that I tried to use were grayed out. I emailed them asking to cancel the order and no response to cancel, instead a confirmation of shipping two days later. I couldn’t find another way to log on to a website and change info or cancel the order. There is not a way to remove your credit card, only add new ones. My hands felt tied using this app.

title: Best Trash Can EVER!
text: This is hands down the best trash can I have ever owned! I needed a slim one that would fit in between my refrigerator and a table- it’s perfect! The best thing is how easy it is to empty. The liners fit perfectly and are so easy to use. The liners are also very strong. The purchase was well worth the price! It will last forever.

title: 10 Plus by Blueyes
text: I searched far and wide prior to purchasing this garbage can from QVC. It came with a nice supply of bags. It is absolutely what I was hoping for, and more. The app is wonderful, too. I would recommend simple human to anybody, anywhere for anything. Thank you for the excellent product. Simple solutions for Simple people!!

title: Worst App EVER
text:
So I get everything is minimalist. But there is ZERO customer support. No link, no email, no phone #, nada.
I ordered a few trash cans for bathroom & office, all very nice, but the uphill struggle to order a box of bags has never been so frustrating!
Order was placed the same day I got the cans.
No email, no record of the order nothing. Figured I was the X factor, but I am positive I placed the order.
Placed an order again on 2/15… get confirmation email. (No customer service info on the email)
2/18 gets email that my order is shipping “soon”… nothing since. 
Check the app only to see my order was “paused” on 2/19????
Well stuff that for a game. 
Now the uphill battle to get hold of “someone” to cancel & delete my account from this company…
Maybe I’ll reach out to my Attorney Generals Office…

title: Convenient
text: We just got the sensor trash can that came with a bag of liners. To my surprise when putting in a new liner one night there was a tag on the bag saying you are running low with a note about the app. I downloaded it and was able to order new liners with apple pay in minutes.

title: Very simple and easy UI, but almost TOO simple.
text: Great UI, but when it’s time to purchase the bags, there’s no specs available to review. I had to just hope it was correct because I couldn’t see whether it was the right style or size. Would give users peace of mind to include that so we can double check on our end.

title: Great interface- missing a second address line
text: I really like this interface- very easy to use - like everything from Simplehuman. But i hope they’ll add a second address line so that i can put my work company’s name so that i can receive shipments at work.

title: Simple & Convenient
text: I was running low on soap pouches for my soap dispenser and was going to visit the website but saw there was an app instead. I’m so glad I downloaded it and made my first purchase! I wish I knew about it sooner!

title: Works, not updated for newer devices.
text:
App is nice overall. It’s simple, and works well, and is nicely streamlined. Apple Pay support is nice to have, too.

Knocked a couple stars off because the app still hasn’t been updated to fit the screen of devices released a year ago (XS Max Plus), which really takes a lot away from the experience.

title: Simple process
text: This could not have been easier.  Even putting in my payment info the prompts went to the next field automatically...truly, simplehuman.

title: Amazing Experience
text: This is the very best garbage can I have ever had in my possession. The app is amazing, the product is exquisite, and the purchasing through the app was simple, seamless, and quick. I highly recommend the garbage can and the bags. I plan to purchase more simple human products!

title: Auto-pauses delivery, unusable
text:
This is about as frustrating as it gets. 

Set up one trashcan, received delivery of the smallest quantity of liners possible, but since even the slowest frequency was too quick, put that trashcan on hold. So far so good. 

Added another trashcan, ordered the smallest quantity for that one, go back to check status: paused! Went through the cycle about half a dozen times: un-pause, get a ship date, go back to check status a day or two later (ship date is always a few days out): paused!

Have not checked if the first trashcan being paused messes up the second one, but reading through other reviews it looks like a bug...

Please, fix it, because it makes this otherwise cleverly designed & potentially very useful app completely unusable!

title: Very friendly app:
text:
Made the whole transaction in just a few minutes, registration and ordered product online, all done using my iPhone.
Like their product very much. Expect to receive my order in about three days.....Try'em

title: Best Garbage Can EVER!!
text: My hubby didn’t want to spend the money on this garbage/recycle can duo. We ended up buying it and he LOVES it!! Says it is the best garbage can ever and I agree. The bags are a little more but worth every penny!! They are thick plastic and fit the can perfectly. Get one of these, you won’t be sorry!!!

title: Too expensive to not even connect to the WiFi
text: I have the wide 3 panel mirror, I just spent an hour trying to connect my phone to it. It doesn’t go beyond “connect to a network” because it doesn’t display any to choose from. I disconnected everything from my WiFi to have the full range and tried moving around the house with the mirror but nothing has worked! Can’t believe a $300 mirror can’t even do a simple thing like connect to the WiFi!!!!!!! Irritating!!!!!

title: Very disappointed
text: In order to use the product they force you to give your personal information and register.  It can only be linked to one person in the house.  I have spent two days now trying to get it to disconnect and link to my app.  Instructions are completely wrong.  Doesn’t work as advertised and when working is too basic to be worth the extra money!

title: Finally!
text: I love this mirror! You can see from all angles and the magnifier is perfect for eye makeup application. I like the lighting choices for different times of day. I’ve bought many mirrors but none compare with this one.

title: Great Product
text: When my wife decided to spend $100 for a trash bin to put in our upgraded kitchen I thought it was overspending. From the time I removed it from the package I was very impressed of it’s sleek design and awesome  steel appliance. I am very satisfied with the purchase. Thank You Simplehuman

title: Great products
text:
I have been a big fan since 2015 and I feel silly to say that I did even know that they had an app....anyway I love 💗 how easy, simple and elegant there recycle ♻️ cans are and the motion sensor soap pumps. I now have my eye 👁 on the dish rack. 
Let’s see what they come up with next.

title: Fix the bug

title: A tiny bit buggy...
text: D/Led app to reorder liners. Easy enough to get registered. But app was missing a few important parts. Like the place where you order things? Closed and relaunched and new icons magically appeared. Was a bit frustrating but, once relaunched, seems fine. Hoping the convenience outweighs the bugs.

title: Great purchase!
text: Easy no touch except to put in trash liner. Love the fit of the liner as well. Really like the wall bumper. Smart, low maintenance. Easy breezy! Looks great too! Style and shape fits perfect on side of my kitchen counter top. Very happy! I will look at more household goods by Simplehuman. Keep up the smart work!

title: Trash can
text: Well worth the money!  These bags fit and they don't show. Actually we are using less trash bags because they actually stay in place!   I am excited about this app as I live 100 miles from large stores.

title: App works great!
text:
App is amazing. The only problem i have is the mirror battery doesnt last not even three days. I use it during make session for 2 hrs. And not everyday! I think they need to work on a better battery. 
For the price paid.

text:

I must have the double secret probation version of a SimpleHuman trash can. Apparently our local giant sized hardware store sold us an unauthorized, CIA grade trash can for which I cannot order liners through—what should be—a simple to use app.

title: Good high-quality trash can
text: I love this trash can. Looks great. Works great. Doesn’t show fingerprints. The trash bags made for it are awesome! Great fit and extremely strong. I am very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend.

title: Very difficult to pause an autoship
text: I like this program and app until I tried to put an autoship on hold. If you try, you'll see what I mean. They don't make it easy. title: Great quality and convenient service
